original_text:
And they will go to others and say,
    ‘I have sinned, I have perverted what is right,
    but I did not get what I deserved.
korean_text: 그가 사람 앞에서 노래하여 이르기를 내가 범죄하여 옳은 것을 그르쳤으나 내게 무익하였구나

sentences.original_text: And they will go to others
I have perverted what is right
but I did not get what I deserved.'
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 내가 마땅히 받아야 할 것을 받지 못했나이다.'
